channel.title: - [fixed]
channel.description:
Here's the deal. The other day I plugged my headphones into my laptop because it was night and my parents were sleeping. The next day I when I turned my computer on I couldn't hear any sounds. Tried listening to music, watching videos, system restore, installing drivers over and over again with no result =(. I have no idea what could've caused this. What seems odd to me is that when I plug in the headphones, sound comes from them but when I take them out the laptop's integrated speakers just don't seem to work? Help me I'm really frustrated.
My computer is Packard Bell MX37-U-703. Sound card/drivers are Realtek HD Audio (?). I tried going to the manufacturers site and downloading stuff from there, nothing works. I'm out of luck right now.
Some pics:
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/4im29u.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/d9yyw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/lxvo1.jpg[/img]

item.title: - [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

YES! Somehow for some reason, my laptop fixed itself ;)))))))))) thanks for nothing

Read full topic

item.title: - [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Epe I was just showing Unhandled that he clearly didn’t read/missed the part that said you took the headphones out.

Read full topic

item.title: - [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:5, topic:293083”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=387274.msg2900588#msg2900588 date=1249488828]
Did you unplug your headphones?
[/quote]

[quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=387274.msg2900544#msg2900544 date=1249485904]
What seems odd to me is that when I plug in the headphones, sound comes from them but when I take them out the laptop’s integrated speakers just don’t seem to work?
[/quote][/quote]What? It seems there’s something that I’m clearly not “getting”. Anyways, the headphones are NOT PLUGGED IN, there aren’t any problems in the sound configurations except just for the fact that sound isn’t coming out.

Read full topic
